title: Elton John's husband David Furnish secretly battled booze addiction in rehab
text:

Elton John's husband David Furnish secretly battled booze addiction in rehab after fame and loneliness drove him to drink.

The movie producer, 56, has been legally married to the music superstar, 72, for five years and they have two sons together.

However, Elton has now opened up about the tough times they've been through in recent years, confirming David went to rehab in 2014 to tackle a drinking problem.

The music legend blames his fame and long absences for contributing to David's heartbreaking issues which came to a head after a major row.

David then checked himself into a clinic in California to get help.

In his new autobiography, Me, Elton writes: "I always thought David had slipped into Elton John World with remarkable ease and confidence, but it turned out that a lot of things I was completely used to living with, that I just saw as a fact of life, made him completely anxious.

"He didn’t like being photographed all the time, or being under press scrutiny, or public speaking at [Elton John] AIDS Foundation events.

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: Getty Images for EJAF)

In the book, Elton reveals he discovered David had a problem when he started finding empty bottles of boozed all over the houses they shared.

He also claimed to have once found him passed out slumped over his computer.

Elton continues: "It all came to a head in Los Angeles in 2014, two days before I was due to start a US tour…

"David was feeling low and wanted me to stay the extra night with him. I said no. We had a huge row, I went anyway.

"The next morning, David called and we had a row that made the previous day’s row look like a light-hearted disagreement over what to have for lunch...

(Image: Retna Ltd)

(Image: Maxppp/PA Images)

"The kind of argument where you come off the phone teary and reeling, where things are said that make you wonder whether the next time you communicate it’ll be through lawyers.

"In fact, the next time I heard from David, he had checked himself into a rehab clinic in Malibu. I was pleased he was getting treatment."

The singer added that after David finished treatment, he accompanied him to Alcoholics Anonymous meetings.

Elton endured his own highly-publicised battle with drink and drugs at the height of his career.

He'd been sober for three years when he met David.

They entered into a civil partnership in 2005 and later wed in 2014.
